item.title: 欧洲季节性天然气价差波动令交易商保持警惕
item.description: 欧洲夏季和冬季天然气合同价差的剧烈波动使其成为最热门的交易工具之一，因为官员们正在讨论如何为下一个供暖季填充燃料储备。【原文：Sharp fluctuations in a spread between European summer and winter gas contracts have made it one of the hottest instruments to trade as officials debate how to fill fuel reserves for the next heating season.】

item.title: 忠诚度计划和折扣减少助力 Zalando 实现增长
item.description: 在线时尚平台 Zalando SE 预计今年的销售额和盈利将有所增长，因为它提供的折扣更少，并对客户的忠诚度给予奖励。【原文：Zalando SE, the online fashion platform, forecast rising sales and earnings for this year as it offers fewer discounts and rewards customer loyalty.】

item.title: 贝恩资本认为 7-Eleven 超市业务将进行更多并购和首次公开募股
item.description: 贝恩资本（Bain Capital）表示，它打算进一步寻求交易，以发展从 Seven & i Holdings Co.【原文：Bain Capital said it intends to pursue further deals to grow a Japanese supermarket company it acquired from Seven & i Holdings Co., while seeking to take it public in three years.】

item.title: 俄罗斯称 2 月份原油产量持平，低于欧佩克+配额
item.description: 俄罗斯数据显示，该国 2 月份的原油产量与前一个月相比变化不大，略低于欧佩克+配额。【原文：Russian data show the country’s crude oil production in February was little changed from the month before, holding just below its OPEC+ quota, according to people familiar with the figures.】

item.title: 欧洲和中国恢复乐观，美国盈利前景黯淡
item.description: 盈利势头正从美国转向欧洲和亚洲部分地区。【原文：Earnings momentum is shifting away from the US and toward Europe and parts of Asia.】

item.title: 中国发出信号：有应对关税影响的政策空间
item.description: 尽管美国提高了关税，中国仍制定了雄心勃勃的 2025 年经济增长目标，在此之前，中国最高经济官员表示，面对不确定性和风险，他们留出了足够的行动空间。【原文：China’s top economic officials said they have carved out plenty of room to act in the face of uncertainty and risks, after the country set an ambitious growth target for 2025 despite higher US tariffs.】

item.title: 桥水中国 2025 年伊始表现强劲，竞争对手纷纷效仿
item.description: 桥水联合咨询公司（Bridgewater Associates）正在加强其在中国市场对全球同行的领先优势，今年 1 月份，在引发本地竞争对手竞相效仿其多元化战略之后，桥水联合咨询公司以强劲的涨幅拉开了今年的序幕。【原文：Bridgewater Associates is strengthening its lead in China over global peers, kicking off this year with a strong gain in January after sparking a race among local rivals to follow its strategy of diversification.】

item.title: Blackstone 借助花旗集团为印度交易融资 2 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度最大的业主之一 Blackstone Inc.【原文：Blackstone Inc., one of India’s largest landlords, is tapping Citigroup Inc. to raise at least $200 million-equivalent to back its purchase of South City Mall in Kolkata, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 新加坡对涉嫌服务器欺诈的男子追加指控
item.description: 新加坡检察官在案件中对三名男子提出了新的指控，他们涉嫌欺骗服务器计算机供应商，这些计算机可能含有受美国出口限制的 Nvidia 公司芯片。【原文：Singapore prosecutors leveled new charges in the cases against three men suspected of defrauding suppliers of server computers potentially containing Nvidia Corp. chips subject to US export curbs.】

item.title: 关税 "巷战 "一触即发，印度被敦促反击美国
item.description: 一位资深行业高管表示，如果美国总统唐纳德-特朗普兑现其征收更高进口关税的威胁，印度政府必须准备好对美国采取行动。【原文：India’s government must prepare to take action against the US if President Donald Trump follows through with his threat to impose higher import tariffs, a senior industry executive said.】

item.title: 匈牙利工业下滑，零售业繁荣，经济复苏前景黯淡
item.description: 匈牙利的工业生产连续第 11 个月下降，而零售额却在今年年初猛增，使经济从衰退中复苏的步伐变得模糊不清。【原文：Hungary’s industrial production declined for an 11th month while retail sales jumped at the start of the year, blurring the pace of economic recovery from a recession.】

item.title: 欧洲通信卫星组织称乌克兰星链替代谈判取得进展
item.description: 法国卫星运营商欧洲通信卫星公司（Eutelsat Communications SA）表示，随着美国放弃对欧洲大陆安全的承诺，与欧盟就取代埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 "星链"（Starlink）计划的谈判正在加紧进行。【原文：Eutelsat Communications SA, the French satellite operator, said talks with the European Union on replacing Elon Musk’s Starlink are intensifying, as the US pulls back from its commitments to the continent’s security.】

item.title: 瑞典通胀率意外加速至第二个月
item.description: 瑞典的核心通胀率打破了预测，连续第二个月加速上升，这增加了瑞典央行结束其宽松政策的可能性。【原文：Sweden’s core inflation defied forecasts by accelerating for a second straight month, strengthening the chances that the Riksbank will call an end to its easing campaign.】

item.title: 费率下调影响减弱，FirstRand 利润增长 10
item.description: 南非市值最大的贷款公司 FirstRand Ltd. 的利润增长了 10%，原因是该公司增加了在国内市场的贷款。【原文：FirstRand Ltd.’s profit rose 10% as South Africa’s biggest lender by market value boosted loans in its home market.】

item.title: 马来西亚维持利率不变，尽管面临全球风险，但前景乐观
item.description: 马来西亚周四维持基准利率不变，理由是国内经济增长强劲，同时警告酝酿中的全球贸易战带来的风险。【原文：Malaysia kept its benchmark interest rate unchanged on Thursday, citing robust domestic growth while cautioning of risks from the brewing global trade war.】

item.title: 意大利莱昂纳多公司将与土耳其 Baykar 公司合作研制无人机
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，意大利国防和航空航天公司莱昂纳多公司（Leonardo SpA）和土耳其无人机制造商拜卡尔公司（Baykar）将宣布建立无人机合作伙伴关系。【原文：Italian defense and aerospace company Leonardo SpA and Turkish drone manufacturer Baykar are set to announce a partnership on drones, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 风险投资支持的阿拉尔银行将向其所有者支付 19 亿欧元
item.description: 德国阿拉尔银行（Aareal Bank AG）计划支付 19 亿欧元（21 亿美元）的股息，因为出售软件部门增加了去年的利润。【原文：German property lender Aareal Bank AG plans to pay a €1.9 billion ($2.1 billion) dividend after the sale of its software unit boosted profit last year.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市在错过反弹后有望上涨
Seven & i 宣布新领导人和股票回购以提升估值
item.description: Seven & i Holdings Co. 公司宣布了领导层变动以及回购股票和剥离部门的计划，作为旨在提高股东价值的全面改革的一部分。【原文：Seven & i Holdings Co. announced a leadership change along with plans to buy back stock and divest units, as part of an overhaul aimed at boosting shareholder value.】

item.title: 法航荷航运力增长，盈利改善
item.description: 法航荷航集团（Air France-KLM Group）表示，今年的目标是将座位数提高4-5%，并将整个业务的运营利润至少提高3亿欧元（3.23亿美元），因为该集团将重点放在利润更高的航线上，并在其荷航子公司开展提高效率的活动。【原文：Air France-KLM Group said it aims to lift seat capacity between 4-5% this year and improve operating profit by at least €300 million ($323 million) across the business, as it focuses on more profitable routes and tackles an efficiency drive at its KLM subsidiary.】

item.title: 欧洲正在经历一场正确的债券风暴
item.description:
随着德国准备大举借贷和支出，几乎不用担心欧洲最终会自救的抛售。【原文：

As Germany gets ready to borrow and spend big, there’s little to fear from a selloff that shows Europe is finally helping itself.

】

item.title: <strong>中国主要经济官员在确定增长目标后发表讲话</strong
item.description: 北京人民大会堂。资料来源【原文：The Great Hall of the People in Beijing. Source:】

item.title: 印度股市跌势加剧，杠杆投注缩水
item.description: 由于印度 3.8 万亿美元的股票市场长期低迷，交易商减少了杠杆押注，用于印度股票交易的保证金贷款降至 6 月份以来的最低水平。【原文：Margin loans used for trading in Indian equities fell to its lowest level since June, as traders pared leveraged bets amid a prolonged downturn in the nation’s $3.8 trillion stock market.】

item.title: 百度债券销售掀起人工智能浪潮，定价超越行业平均水平
item.description: 百度公司出售 14 亿美元债务的时机恰到好处。【原文：Baidu Inc. timed it just right with its $1.4 billion debt sale.】

item.title: 尽管关税威胁迫在眉睫，印度仍认为与美国的关系处于 "最佳 "状态
item.description: 印度最高外交官在评论中表示，印度与美国的关系基础稳固，新德里正寻求降低进口关税，以抵御唐纳德-特朗普总统威胁征收可能会破坏双边和全球贸易的对等关税。【原文：India’s top diplomat said relations with the US are on firm footing in comments that come as New Delhi looks to lower tariffs on imports to fend off President Donald Trump’s threatened reciprocal levies that could upend bilateral and global trade.】

item.title: 默克集团预计今年利润增长将在经济复苏中放缓
item.description: 随着生命科学业务的持续复苏以及人工智能的蓬勃发展提升了半导体部门的需求，默克公司预测今年的利润将缓慢增长。【原文：Merck KGaA forecast slow profit growth for this year as its life science business continues to recover and the boom in AI lifts demand at its semiconductor division.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，微软在 IPO 前减少对 CoreWeave 的投入
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周四报道，由于交付问题和错过最后期限，微软公司已经撤销了与云计算供应商CoreWeave的部分承诺。【原文：Microsoft Corp. has withdrawn from some of its commitments with cloud computing provider CoreWeave due to delivery issues and missed deadlines, the Financial Times reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 中国考虑取消未售出住房购买价格上限
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国正在考虑取消地方政府购买未售出公寓的价格上限，因为中国政府正努力加快清理数百万套空置房屋，遏制房地产下滑。【原文：China is considering scrapping a price cap for local governments buying unsold apartments, according to people familiar with the matter, as Beijing seeks to speed up the clearance of millions of empty homes and stem the property downturn.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴引领竞争对手追赶中国 DeepSeek
item.description: 下一个颠覆全球人工智能产业的 DeepSeek 也可能来自中国。【原文：The next DeepSeek to disrupt the global artificial intelligence industry could also come from China.】

item.title: 印度央行行长誓言与金融科技公司展开磋商
item.description: 印度央行要求金融科技公司和数字支付公司确保负责任的创新和更好的合规性，同时承诺采取更具协商性的方法。【原文：India’s central bank asked fintech firms and digital payment companies to ensure responsible innovation and better compliance, even as it promised a more consultative approach.】
